com.guidewire.ab.webservices.api

Interface IZoneImportAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IZoneImportAPISoapBindingStub

    public interface IZoneImportAPI
extends java.rmi.Remote
    IZoneImportAPI is a remote interface to a set of tools to import zone data (in csv format) into the staging tables. See documentation for the zone data csv format.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearProductionTables(java.lang.String countryCode)
      Clears the production tables that contain zone data in preparation for zone data to be imported from the staging tables via the Table Import Tools.
      void clearStagingTables(java.lang.String countryCode)
      Clears the staging tables tables that contain zone data in preparation for zone data to be imported to the staging tables.
      int importToStaging(java.lang.String countryCode, java.lang.String zoneData, boolean clearStaging)
      Import csv formatted data containg zone information.

    • Method Detail

      • clearProductionTables

        void clearProductionTables(java.lang.String countryCode)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                  ServerStateException,
                                  PermissionException,
                                  SOAPException,
                                  BadIdentifierException
        Clears the production tables that contain zone data in preparation for zone data to be imported from the staging tables via the Table Import Tools. This should be called after the staging tables have gone through an integrity check and any offending rows are excluded/corrected.
        Parameters:
        countryCode - a valid country code that has a zone configuartion defined or null. A null value here will clear all zone information.
        Throws:
        ServerStateException - Thrown when a request is made at a time the server is in a state that disallows the request.
        PermissionException - Thrown when the authenticated SOAP user does not have permission to perform the requested operation
        SOAPException - If the country code is not null and does not have a zone configuration defined or does not correspond to a valid country.
        BadIdentifierException - Thrown when an internal public ID doesn't map to a real bean (problem could be that type was incorrect)
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a communication error occurs

      • clearStagingTables

        void clearStagingTables(java.lang.String countryCode)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                               ServerStateException,
                               PermissionException,
                               SOAPException,
                               BadIdentifierException
        Clears the staging tables tables that contain zone data in preparation for zone data to be imported to the staging tables. If countryCode is specified and is a valid value, only rows for that country are cleared.
        Parameters:
        countryCode - a valid country code or null. A null value here will clear all zone information.
        Throws:
        ServerStateException - Thrown when a request is made at a time the server is in a state that disallows the request.
        PermissionException - Thrown when the authenticated SOAP user does not have permission to perform the requested operation
        SOAPException - If the country code is not null and does not have a zone configuration defined or does not correspond to a valid country.
        BadIdentifierException - Thrown when an internal public ID doesn't map to a real bean (problem could be that type was incorrect)
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a communication error occurs

      • importToStaging

        int importToStaging(java.lang.String countryCode,
                  java.lang.String zoneData,
                  boolean clearStaging)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                           ServerStateException,
                           PermissionException,
                           SOAPException,
                           BadIdentifierException
        Import csv formatted data containg zone information. See the documentation for details of the expected csv format. This gives you the option of clearing out the staging tables before loading the data.
        Parameters:
        countryCode - the code for the country to which this data belongs
        zoneData - The data to import, passed as a String.
        clearStaging - Clears the staging tables before doing the import, this only clears the staging tables of the data for the specified country, if all data needs to be cleared, use table import instead
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ServerStateException - Thrown when a request is made at a time the server is in a state that disallows the request.
        PermissionException - Thrown when the authenticated SOAP user does not have permission to perform the requested operation
        SOAPException - If the country code is not null and does not have a zone configuration defined or does not correspond to a valid country.
        BadIdentifierException - Thrown when an internal public ID doesn't map to a real bean (problem could be that type was incorrect)
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a communication error occurs
